name: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat

passive.name: Glance Back
passive.description: When the wearer hits an enemy and if the hit enemy is not already Ensnared, then there is a <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> base chance to Ensnare the hit enemy. Ensnared enemies' DEF decreases by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> for {{3}} turn(s).
